channel.title: Keras on Mark LeBoeuf
channel.description: Recent content in Keras on Mark LeBoeuf

item.title: Keras End-to-End Tutorial
item.description: Most Keras tutorials I’ve come across outline the process of creating a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) with built-in datasets. While this is a great place to begin, there’s a bit more involved in terms of pre-processing when starting out with just a bunch of pictures. This post provides a quick, end-to-end walkthrough of how to implement a CNN with Keras in Python from scratch.
